us.title: About us
us.paragraph1: Lic. Midwife Delsi Nataly Almerco Rojas
us.paragraph2:
Graduate of the National University of San Marcos (UNMSM)
Specialist in High-Risk Obstetrics and Obstetric Emergencies
Diploma in Sexual and Reproductive Health

us1.subtitle1: “Because your health, your body, and your decisions deserve to be heard and respected”
us1.paragraph: We are DelSalud, a safe space for everyone. We provide care in sexual and reproductive health with a human, scientific, and non-judgmental approach, because we firmly believe that your body and your decisions deserve respect.

services.title: Services
items: Screenings for HIV, syphilis, and hepatitis
Counseling in sexual and reproductive health

atenciones.servicios: In-person and virtual, Video calls, Messages
